data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Popov †, George B., Fishpool, Lincoln D. C., Rowell, C. Hugh F. (2019): A review of the Acridinae s. str. (Orthoptera: Acridoidea: Acrididae) of eastern Africa with taxonomic changes and description of new taxa. Journal of Orthoptera Research 28 (2): 37-105, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.28.29312, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.28.29312
